wordGroup: cyclical fluctuation n. 循环变动，周期性波动

sentences.en: Economic activity often follows a cyclical pattern.
sentences.cn: 经济活动常常遵循周期性模式。

sentences.en: There is also a cyclical pattern in fashion.
sentences.cn: 时尚业也存在着一个周期性的模式。

sentences.en: In this situation, the predator and prey population may continue in this cyclical pattern for some time.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下，捕食者和被捕食者可能会在一段时间内继续这种循环模式。
